languages.text: "Юность — время безрассудства. Не раз слышала это в Схола Прогениум и в послушничестве. Но юность также время прямоты! Давайте выслушаем этого юношу, прежде чем судить его".

traits.locale_text: "Юность — время безрассудства. Не раз слышала это в Скола Прогениум и в послушничестве. Но юность также время прямоты! Давайте выслушаем этого юношу прежде чем судить его".
"Юность — время безрассудства. Не раз слышала это в Схола Прогениум и в послушничестве. Но юность также время прямоты! Давайте выслушаем этого юношу, прежде чем судить его".

languages.text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."
languages.original_text: "Юность — время безрассудства. Не раз слышала это в Схола Прогениум и в послушничестве. Но юность также время прямоты! Давайте выслушаем этого юношу, прежде чем судить его".

traits.locale_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

"Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

"Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

"Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

languages.text: 「若さとは無謀な時期。このような教えを帝国教導院で、また修練期間に何度となく受けた。でも、若さとは同時にまっすぐな時代でもあります！処遇を決める前に、この少年の話を聞きましょう」
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: 「若さとは無謀な時期。このような教えを帝国教導院で、また修練期間に何度となく受けた。でも、若さとは同時にまっすぐな時代でもあります！処遇を決める前に、この少年の話を聞きましょう」

languages.text: “年轻人往往很鲁莽，我在忠嗣学院担任见习修女期间，不止一次听到过这样的话。但年轻人往往也很坦率，在评判这个年轻人的所作所为之前，先听听他有什么要说吧。”
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: “年轻人往往很鲁莽，我在忠嗣学院担任见习修女期间，不止一次听到过这样的话。但年轻人往往也很坦率，在评判这个年轻人的所作所为之前，先听听他有什么要说吧。”

languages.text: «La juventud es tiempo de insensatez. Lo decían constantemente en la Schola Progenium y durante mi noviciado. ¡Pero también es tiempo de franqueza! Será mejor que escuchemos a este muchacho antes de juzgarlo».
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: «La juventud es tiempo de insensatez. Lo decían constantemente en la Schola Progenium y durante mi noviciado. ¡Pero también es tiempo de franqueza! Será mejor que escuchemos a este muchacho antes de juzgarlo».

languages.text: "Die Jugend ist eine Zeit des Leichtsinns. Diesen Satz habe ich in der Schola Progenium und während meines Noviziats öfter gehört. Aber die Jugend ist auch eine Zeit der Direktheit! Wir sollten diesem jungen Mann zuhören, bevor wir ihn verurteilen."
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: "Die Jugend ist eine Zeit des Leichtsinns. Diesen Satz habe ich in der Schola Progenium und während meines Noviziats öfter gehört. Aber die Jugend ist auch eine Zeit der Direktheit! Wir sollten diesem jungen Mann zuhören, bevor wir ihn verurteilen."

languages.text: « La jeunesse est l'âge de l'imprudence, comme on me le disait souvent à la Schola Progenium et pendant mon noviciat. Mais c'est aussi l'âge de la franchise, alors écoutons ce jeune homme avant de le juger. »
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: « La jeunesse est l'âge de l'imprudence, comme on me le disait souvent à la Schola Progenium et pendant mon noviciat. Mais c'est aussi l'âge de la franchise, alors écoutons ce jeune homme avant de le juger. »

languages.text: "Gençlik demek pervasızlık demektir. Bu lafı Schola Progenium'da ve acemilik dönemimde sık sık duymuşumdur. Gençlik demek bir yandan da dobralık demektir! Hüküm vermeden önce bu delikanlıyı bir dinleyelim."
languages.original_text: "Youth is a time of recklessness. I heard that said more than once in the Schola Progenium and during my novitiate. But youth is also a time of directness! Let us listen to this young man before we judge him."

traits.locale_text: "Gençlik demek pervasızlık demektir. Bu lafı Schola Progenium'da ve çıraklık dönemimde sık sık duymuşumdur. Gençlik demek bir yandan da dürüstlük demektir! Hüküm vermeden önce bu genç adamı bir dinleyelim."
